en.index_page_title_meta: Portal 7: Empower Digital - Official Landing Page
en.hero_tagline: Embrace Your Potential: Empowered by Inspiration, Driven by Innovation
en.about_what_is_portal_p1: In today's ever-evolving digital era, the youth play a crucial role as agents of change. Portal 7 emerges as a space for digital expression and innovation, encouraging participants not only to create visually appealing works but also to embed them with values of sustainability and social impact, in line with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
en.about_what_is_portal_p2: Organized by the Student Executive Board of IPB University's Vocational School, Portal 7 serves as a platform to connect ideas, broaden horizons, and shape digital creators who are inspiring, solution-oriented, and ready to face global challenges through the power of innovation.
en.inspire_framework_title: INSPIRE Framework: Our Vision & Mission Foundation
en.inspire_i1_desc: Igniting new ideas and limitless creative spirit.
en.inspire_n_desc: Building strong and sustainable connections and collaborations.
en.inspire_s_desc: Encouraging the creation of creative solutions for real challenges.
en.inspire_p_desc: Exploring and maximizing the unique potential of each individual.
en.inspire_i2_desc: Presenting new breakthroughs in technology and digital creativity.
en.inspire_r_desc: Connecting learning with the needs of industry and society.
en.inspire_e_desc: Empowering the young generation to take roles and create positive impacts.
en.sdg_commitment_subtitle: Portal 7 actively champions the Sustainable Development Goals through digital innovation and youth empowerment.
en.sdg_2_desc: Fostering digital solutions and awareness campaigns that contribute to food security, sustainable agriculture, and improved nutrition through innovative projects.
en.sdg_4_desc: Providing accessible digital skills training, insightful seminars, and competitive platforms that enhance learning opportunities and promote lifelong education for all.
en.sdg_7_desc: Encouraging projects and discussions on leveraging technology for sustainable energy solutions, promoting awareness, and inspiring innovation in clean energy adoption.
en.wow_guest_star_subtitle: Get ready to be inspired by a leading voice and innovator of 2025!
en.mysterious_guest_title: Renowned for groundbreaking work in the creative industry.
en.mysterious_guest_teaser: Get ready for an unforgettable session that will spark your imagination and redefine possibilities!
en.highlight_subtitle: This is where creativity ignites and innovation takes flight. Choose your arena, sharpen your skills.
en.highlight_arena_intro: Forge your legend. Showcase your talent. The ultimate digital battleground awaits your genius.
en.highlight_uiux_desc: Sculpt intuitive digital experiences that captivate and convert. Design the future, today.
en.highlight_poster_desc: Unleash visual symphonies. Craft posters that don't just speak, they roar your message.
en.highlight_movie_desc: Tell world-changing stories in minutes. Direct your vision, captivate hearts, inspire action.
en.highlight_knowledge_intro: Ignite your curiosity. Absorb game-changing insights from the masters of digital craft.
en.highlight_button_discover: Discover the Lineup
en.past_guest_stars_subtitle: We have featured inspiring digital creators:
en.registration_subtitle: Don't miss the golden opportunity to be part of Portal 7! Choose your registration batch and get ready to innovate.
en.registration_batch_note: Registration links will be active according to the schedule. Make sure you don't miss out!
en.registration_form_status_message: The registration portal will open according to the batch schedule. Time to prepare yourself!
en.registration_process_info: Registration is done online via the links on the right. Complete details for work submission and other documents are available in the guidebook.
en.registration_click_to_register: Click to open the registration form
en.faq_a1: Yes, there is a registration fee stated in the guidebook.
en.faq_q2: Can participants register for more than one competition category?
en.faq_a2: Yes, as long as it complies with the terms and by filling out the form for each category.
en.faq_q3: Do participants have to be from IPB?
en.faq_a3: No. Portal 7 is open to participants from all over Indonesia and internationally.
en.faq_q4: Will all participants receive a certificate?
en.faq_a4: Yes, all participants who meet the requirements will receive an e-certificate.
en.faq_q5: How to access the work submission platform?
en.faq_a5: Details and submission links will be provided after participants complete registration.
en.who_can_join_subtitle: Open to everyone with an interest in the digital creative world!
en.who_can_join_list_item1: D3/D4/S1 students from all over Indonesia & internationally
en.who_can_join_team_info: Participants can register as individuals or teams. No prior experience required, only creativity!
en.cta_bottom_title: Ready to create, compete, and connect?
en.cta_bottom_subtitle: Join now and realize your vision through digital works with Portal 7.
en.media_section_subtitle: Follow the latest developments, get creative insights, and look back at unforgettable moments from Portal 7!
en.contact_subtitle: We're ready to hear your brilliant ideas or answer your queries. Let's get in touch!

en.sponsorship_combined_subtitle: Join us in empowering digital creativity and connect with a vibrant, innovative community. We have exciting opportunities for collaboration.
en.sponsorship_card_desc: Support the next wave of digital talent and gain prominent exposure. View our proposal for detailed partnership tiers and benefits.
en.medpar_card_desc: Collaborate with us to share the stories of innovation and creativity from Portal 7. Let's amplify our reach together.

en.seminar_awarding_desc: The pinnacle of Portal 7! Celebrate achievements, witness the crowning of champions, and connect with fellow creators and industry professionals.
en.seminar_awarding_note: Attended by finalists, judges, speakers, and invited guests.
en.seminar_cta_subtitle: Details for seminar registration (if separate from the competition) or ticket information will be announced soon. Stay tuned to our social media!
en.uiux_detail_hero_subtitle: This document is the official technical guide, updated according to the change to a team-based competition system. All participants are expected to follow this guide in preparing their submissions.
en.uiux_detail_submission_intro: Each team is required to submit the following three main components:
en.uiux_detail_pitchdeck_title: B. Detailed Pitch Deck Guide (Max. 25 Slides)
en.uiux_detail_pitchdeck_intro: The Pitch Deck is a primary assessment component that must narrate your team's entire process, from idea to solution.
en.uiux_detail_pd_cover_item2: Team Identity: Include the full names of all members (2-3 people) along with their main roles/contributions in the project (e.g., UX Researcher, UI Designer, Project Manager).
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_bg_desc: Explain the context, urgency, and specific problem you aim to solve.
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_method_desc: To validate your problem, choose and conduct at least ONE of the following research methods:
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_method1: User Interview: Conduct in-depth interviews with 3-5 people who are your target audience.
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_method2: Online Survey: Distribute an online questionnaire to obtain quantitative data.
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_method3: Competitor Analysis: Analyze 2-3 existing similar products/applications to find their strengths and weaknesses.
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_method4: Secondary Research (Desk Research): Collect and analyze existing data, articles, journals, or reports to support your argument about the urgency of the problem.
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_method5: Forum & Review Analysis: Dig for insights from reviews on the App Store/Play Store or discussions in online forums (like Reddit, etc.) to find real user complaints and needs.
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_results_desc: Present the key findings from your research and summarize them in the form of:
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_persona: User Persona: One representative fictional user profile.
en.uiux_detail_pd_research_painpoints: Pain Points: 3-5 main difficulties faced by the persona.
en.uiux_detail_pd_ideation_item1: Show how your team brainstormed to generate solution ideas.
en.uiux_detail_pd_ideation_item2: Explain the main features you propose and provide reasons why these features are a priority.
en.uiux_detail_pd_userflow_item1: Illustrate the most crucial user interaction flow in using your solution, from start to goal achievement.
en.uiux_detail_pd_hifi_item1: Present several of the most representative screens from your application.
en.uiux_detail_pd_hifi_item2: Also, include a simple Design System (Colors, Typography, Icons) that you used to maintain consistency.
en.uiux_detail_pd_vision_intro: Explain the long-term vision of your project. You can choose 1-2 of the areas below that are most relevant to describe:
en.uiux_detail_pd_vision_item1: Product Evolution: What's the next big feature? How will this product evolve in the next year?
en.uiux_detail_pd_vision_item2: Growth & Outreach: How will you reach more users or collaborate with other parties?
en.uiux_detail_pd_vision_item3: Sustainable Impact: How will you measure the success of your project's social impact?
en.uiux_detail_pd_closing_item1: Close your presentation with a strong conclusion.
en.uiux_detail_pd_closing_item2: Re-include the view-only link to your interactive prototype in Figma.
en.uiux_detail_video_intro: The demonstration video is a mandatory component aimed at showcasing the function and value of your solution visually and engagingly.
en.uiux_detail_video_format_item2: Minimum video resolution of 1080p (Full HD) with MP4 file format.
en.uiux_detail_video_audio_item1: Narration (voice-over) in English with clear audio quality is mandatory.
en.uiux_detail_video_audio_item2: Videos without narration or with only music/text will not be judged maximally.
en.uiux_detail_video_structure_intro_item1: Introduce the project title, team name, and all members.
en.uiux_detail_video_structure_intro_item2: State the problem and the SDG being addressed.
en.uiux_detail_video_structure_demo_item1: Must show one most crucial user flow from start to finish.
en.uiux_detail_video_structure_demo_item2: Narrate the scenario being performed by the user, not just randomly clicking buttons.
en.uiux_detail_video_structure_outro_item1: Provide a brief statement about the expected impact of your solution.
en.uiux_detail_video_structure_outro_item2: End the video with a call-to-action or hope for future development.
en.uiux_detail_appendix_intro: To strengthen your arguments and validation, it is highly recommended to include research proof as an appendix at the end of your presentation (within the 25-slide limit). Here are the suggested formats:
en.uiux_detail_appendix_interview_item1: Documentation: Screenshot of the conversation (chat) or a photo of the interview session (interviewee's face may be blurred for privacy).
en.uiux_detail_appendix_interview_item2: Summary: A simple table containing a list of key questions and a summary of the most important answers or quotes from the interviewees.
en.uiux_detail_appendix_survey_item1: Link & Demographics: Include a link to the active survey (e.g., Google Forms) and a summary of respondent demographics (e.g., "50 respondents, 60% students, 40% workers").
en.uiux_detail_appendix_survey_item2: Key Results: Screenshot 2-3 of the most relevant charts or diagrams from your survey results that support your main arguments.
en.uiux_detail_appendix_secondary_item1: List of Sources: Create a list of the sources you used (e.g., Article/Report Title, Author, Year, and Link). 3-5 of the most relevant sources are sufficient.
en.uiux_detail_appendix_forum_item1: Screenshot Collection: Present 3-5 of the most representative screenshots of reviews (from App Store/Play Store) or comments/discussions (from online forums). Highlight or mark the most important parts of the text.

id.index_page_title_meta: Portal 7: Empower Digital - Halaman Utama Resmi
id.hero_tagline: Embrace Your Potential: Empowered by Inspiration, Driven by Innovation
id.about_what_is_portal_p1: Di era digital yang terus berkembang, generasi muda memiliki peran penting sebagai agen perubahan. Portal 7 hadir sebagai ruang ekspresi dan inovasi digital yang mendorong peserta untuk tidak hanya menciptakan karya menarik secara visual, tetapi juga memiliki nilai keberlanjutan dan berdampak sosial, sejalan dengan Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
id.about_what_is_portal_p2: Diselenggarakan oleh BEM Sekolah Vokasi IPB University, Portal 7 menjadi wadah untuk menghubungkan ide, memperluas wawasan, dan membentuk kreator digital yang inspiratif, solutif, dan siap menghadapi tantangan global melalui kekuatan inovasi.
id.inspire_framework_title: INSPIRE Framework: Landasan Visi & Misi Kami
id.inspire_i1_desc: Memicu ide-ide baru dan semangat berkarya tanpa batas.
id.inspire_n_desc: Membangun koneksi dan kolaborasi yang kuat dan berkelanjutan.
id.inspire_s_desc: Mendorong penciptaan solusi kreatif untuk tantangan nyata.
id.inspire_p_desc: Menggali dan memaksimalkan potensi unik setiap individu.
id.inspire_i2_desc: Menghadirkan terobosan baru dalam teknologi dan kreativitas digital.
id.inspire_r_desc: Menghubungkan pembelajaran dengan kebutuhan industri dan masyarakat.
id.inspire_e_desc: Memberdayakan generasi muda untuk mengambil peran dan menciptakan dampak positif.
id.sdg_commitment_subtitle: Portal 7 secara aktif mendukung Tujuan Pembangunan Berkelanjutan melalui inovasi digital dan pemberdayaan pemuda.
id.sdg_2_desc: Mendorong solusi digital dan kampanye kesadaran yang berkontribusi pada ketahanan pangan, pertanian berkelanjutan, dan peningkatan gizi melalui proyek inovatif.
id.sdg_4_desc: Menyediakan pelatihan keterampilan digital yang dapat diakses, seminar yang mendalam, dan platform kompetitif yang meningkatkan peluang belajar dan mempromosikan pendidikan seumur hidup untuk semua.
id.sdg_7_desc: Mendorong proyek dan diskusi tentang pemanfaatan teknologi untuk solusi energi berkelanjutan, mempromosikan kesadaran, dan menginspirasi inovasi dalam adopsi energi bersih.
id.wow_guest_star_subtitle: Bersiaplah untuk terinspirasi oleh suara terdepan dan inovator tahun 2025!
id.mysterious_guest_title: Dikenal atas karya terobosan di industri kreatif.
id.mysterious_guest_teaser: Bersiaplah untuk sesi tak terlupakan yang akan memicu imajinasimu dan mendefinisikan ulang kemungkinan!
id.highlight_subtitle: Di sinilah kreativitas menyala dan inovasi melambung tinggi. Pilih arenmu, asah kemampuanmu.
id.highlight_arena_intro: Ukir legendamu. Tunjukkan bakatmu. Medan pertempuran digital terhebat menanti kejeniusanmu.
id.highlight_uiux_desc: Ciptakan pengalaman digital intuitif yang memikat dan mengubah. Rancang masa depan, hari ini.
id.highlight_poster_desc: Lepaskan simfoni visual. Buat poster yang tidak hanya berbicara, tetapi meneriakkan pesanmu.
id.highlight_movie_desc: Ceritakan kisah yang mengubah dunia dalam hitungan menit. Arahkan visimu, pikat hati, inspirasi tindakan.
id.highlight_knowledge_intro: Nyalakan rasa ingin tahumu. Serap wawasan yang mengubah permainan dari para master kerajinan digital.
id.highlight_button_discover: Temukan Daftar Pengisi Acara
id.past_guest_stars_subtitle: Kami telah menghadirkan para kreator digital inspiratif:
id.registration_subtitle: Jangan lewatkan kesempatan emas untuk menjadi bagian dari Portal 7! Pilih batch pendaftaranmu dan bersiaplah untuk berinovasi.
id.registration_batch_note: Link pendaftaran akan aktif sesuai jadwal. Pastikan kamu tidak ketinggalan!
id.registration_form_status_message: Portal pendaftaran akan terbuka sesuai jadwal batch. Saatnya persiapkan dirimu!
id.registration_process_info: Pendaftaran dilakukan online melalui link di sebelah kanan. Detail lengkap pengumpulan karya dan dokumen lain tersedia di dalam guidebook.
id.faq_a1: Ya, terdapat biaya registrasi yang tertera dalam guidebook.
id.faq_q2: Apakah peserta bisa mendaftar lebih dari satu cabang lomba?
id.faq_a2: Bisa, asalkan sesuai ketentuan dan mengisi formulir untuk masing-masing cabang.
id.faq_a3: Tidak. Portal 7 terbuka untuk peserta dari seluruh Indonesia dan internasional.
id.faq_q4: Apakah semua peserta akan mendapat sertifikat?
id.faq_a4: Ya, semua peserta yang memenuhi ketentuan akan mendapatkan e-sertifikat.
id.faq_q5: Bagaimana cara mengakses platform pengumpulan karya?
id.faq_a5: Detail dan link pengumpulan akan diberikan setelah peserta menyelesaikan registrasi.

id.who_can_join_team_info: Peserta dapat mendaftar sebagai individu atau tim. Tidak memerlukan pengalaman sebelumnya, hanya kreativitas!

id.seminar_mysterious_guest_role: Dikenal atas karya terobosan di industri kreatif.

Terbuka untuk umum dan peserta kompetisi.
id.seminar_coaching_date: Akhir September 2025 (Tanggal Pasti TBA)
id.seminar_coaching_desc: Sesi eksklusif untuk 10 finalis terbaik. Terima bimbingan langsung untuk menyempurnakan proyek Anda dan mematangkan presentasi akhir Anda.
id.seminar_awarding_desc: Puncak Portal 7! Rayakan pencapaian, saksikan penobatan para juara, dan terhubung dengan sesama kreator dan profesional industri.
id.seminar_awarding_note: Dihadiri oleh finalis, juri, pembicara, dan tamu undangan.
id.seminar_cta_subtitle: Detail pendaftaran seminar (jika terpisah dari kompetisi) atau informasi tiket akan segera diumumkan. Pantau terus media sosial kami!
id.uiux_detail_hero_subtitle: Dokumen ini merupakan panduan teknis resmi yang telah diperbarui sesuai dengan perubahan sistem kompetisi menjadi format tim. Semua peserta diharapkan untuk mengikuti panduan ini dalam mempersiapkan karya mereka.
id.uiux_detail_submission_intro: Setiap tim wajib mengumpulkan tiga komponen utama berikut:
id.uiux_detail_pitchdeck_title: B. Panduan Detail Pitch Deck (Maks. 25 Slide)
id.uiux_detail_pitchdeck_intro: Pitch Deck adalah komponen utama penilaian yang harus menceritakan keseluruhan proses tim Anda, dari ide hingga solusi.
id.uiux_detail_pd_cover_item2: Identitas Tim: Cantumkan nama lengkap semua anggota (2-3 orang) beserta peran/kontribusi utamanya dalam proyek (Contoh: UX Researcher, UI Designer, Project Manager).
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_bg_desc: Jelaskan konteks, urgensi, dan masalah spesifik yang ingin Anda selesaikan.
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_method_desc: Untuk memvalidasi masalah Anda, pilih dan lakukan setidaknya SATU dari metode riset berikut:
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_method1: Wawancara Pengguna: Lakukan wawancara mendalam dengan 3-5 orang yang menjadi target audiens Anda.
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_method2: Survei Online: Sebarkan kuesioner online untuk mendapatkan data kuantitatif.
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_method3: Analisis Kompetitor: Analisis 2-3 produk/aplikasi serupa yang sudah ada untuk menemukan kekuatan dan kelemahan mereka.
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_method4: Riset Sekunder (Desk Research): Kumpulkan dan analisis data, artikel, jurnal, atau laporan yang sudah ada untuk mendukung argumen Anda tentang urgensi masalah.
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_method5: Analisis Forum & Ulasan: Gali wawasan dari ulasan di App Store/Play Store atau diskusi di forum online (seperti Reddit, dll.) untuk menemukan keluhan dan kebutuhan nyata pengguna.
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_results_desc: Sajikan temuan kunci dari riset Anda dan rangkum dalam bentuk:
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_persona: Persona Pengguna: Satu profil pengguna fiktif yang representatif.
id.uiux_detail_pd_research_painpoints: Poin Masalah (Pain Points): 3-5 kesulitan utama yang dihadapi oleh persona.
id.uiux_detail_pd_ideation_item1: Tunjukkan bagaimana tim Anda melakukan brainstorming untuk menghasilkan ide solusi.
id.uiux_detail_pd_ideation_item2: Jelaskan fitur-fitur utama yang Anda usulkan dan berikan alasan mengapa fitur tersebut menjadi prioritas.
id.uiux_detail_pd_userflow_item1: Gambarkan alur interaksi pengguna yang paling krusial dalam menggunakan solusi Anda, dari awal hingga tujuan tercapai.
id.uiux_detail_pd_hifi_item1: Sajikan beberapa tampilan layar (screens) yang paling representatif dari aplikasi Anda.
id.uiux_detail_pd_hifi_item2: Sertakan juga Design System sederhana (Warna, Tipografi, Ikon) yang Anda gunakan untuk menjaga konsistensi.
id.uiux_detail_pd_vision_intro: Jelaskan visi jangka panjang dari proyek Anda. Anda dapat memilih 1-2 area di bawah ini yang paling relevan untuk dijelaskan:
id.uiux_detail_pd_vision_item1: Evolusi Produk: Apa fitur besar berikutnya? Bagaimana produk ini akan berkembang dalam satu tahun ke depan?
id.uiux_detail_pd_vision_item2: Pertumbuhan & Jangkauan: Bagaimana Anda akan menjangkau lebih banyak pengguna atau berkolaborasi dengan pihak lain?
id.uiux_detail_pd_vision_item3: Dampak Berkelanjutan: Bagaimana Anda akan mengukur keberhasilan dampak sosial dari proyek Anda?
id.uiux_detail_pd_closing_item1: Tutup presentasi Anda dengan kesimpulan yang kuat.
id.uiux_detail_pd_closing_item2: Sertakan kembali link view-only ke prototipe interaktif Anda di Figma.
id.uiux_detail_video_intro: Video demonstrasi adalah komponen wajib yang bertujuan untuk menampilkan fungsi dan nilai dari solusi Anda secara visual dan menarik.
id.uiux_detail_video_format_item2: Resolusi video minimal 1080p (Full HD) dengan format file MP4.
id.uiux_detail_video_audio_item1: Wajib menggunakan narasi (voice-over) dalam Bahasa Inggris dengan kualitas audio yang jernih.
id.uiux_detail_video_audio_item2: Video tanpa narasi atau hanya dengan musik/teks tidak akan dinilai maksimal.
id.uiux_detail_video_structure_intro_item1: Perkenalkan judul proyek, nama tim, dan semua anggota.
id.uiux_detail_video_structure_intro_item2: Sebutkan masalah dan SDG yang diangkat.
id.uiux_detail_video_structure_demo_item1: Wajib menunjukkan satu alur pengguna (user flow) yang paling krusial dari awal hingga selesai.
id.uiux_detail_video_structure_demo_item2: Ceritakan skenario yang sedang dijalankan oleh pengguna, bukan hanya mengklik tombol secara acak.
id.uiux_detail_video_structure_outro_item1: Berikan pernyataan singkat mengenai dampak yang diharapkan dari solusi Anda.
id.uiux_detail_video_structure_outro_item2: Tutup video dengan call-to-action atau harapan untuk pengembangan selanjutnya.
id.uiux_detail_appendix_intro: Untuk memperkuat argumen dan validasi Anda, sangat disarankan untuk menyertakan lampiran bukti riset di akhir presentasi Anda (di dalam batas 25 slide). Berikut adalah format yang disarankan:
id.uiux_detail_appendix_interview_item1: Dokumentasi: Screenshot percakapan (chat) atau foto sesi wawancara (wajah narasumber boleh diblur untuk menjaga privasi).
id.uiux_detail_appendix_interview_item2: Rangkuman: Tabel sederhana berisi daftar pertanyaan kunci dan rangkuman jawaban atau kutipan paling penting dari narasumber.
id.uiux_detail_appendix_survey_item1: Tautan & Demografi: Cantumkan link survei yang masih aktif (misal: Google Forms) dan ringkasan demografi responden (misal: "50 responden, 60% mahasiswa, 40% pekerja").
id.uiux_detail_appendix_survey_item2: Hasil Kunci: Screenshot 2-3 grafik atau diagram paling relevan dari hasil survei Anda yang mendukung argumen utama.
id.uiux_detail_appendix_secondary_item1: Daftar Sumber: Buat daftar sumber yang Anda gunakan (misal: Judul Artikel/Laporan, Penulis, Tahun, dan Link). Cukup 3-5 sumber paling relevan.
id.uiux_detail_appendix_forum_item1: Kumpulan Screenshot: Sajikan 3-5 screenshot ulasan (dari App Store/Play Store) atau komentar/diskusi (dari forum online) yang paling representatif. Beri highlight atau tanda pada bagian teks yang paling penting.
